name: Ragnarok
passiveSkills: Reduce damage taken by all allies by 60%
Inflict Perfect Corruption and Perfect Crave on each enemy for 1 turn at the start of your turn
Deal true damage to all enemies based on their MAX HP and inflict Sleep or Perfect Sleep on up to two random enemies for 1 turn each action
Grant a random offensive and defensive effect to each ally for every stack of HP Regen present on each ally at the start of your turn.
